data.name: Brunch Rush
data.detailed_description:
About

Brunch Rush is a retro diner RPG where you play as Claire, a young waitress working at Lily's Diner. But this is no ordinary job. Claire has to take orders, make coffee, cook omelettes, wash dishes, and much more. All to make enough money to cover next semester's tuition. Achieve maximum efficiency to earn maximum tips. Use your tips to purchase upgrades for Claire and for the Diner to earn even more tips. The harder you work, the sooner you'll be out of here!

Features:

  • Gameboy inspired retro graphics
  • Serve multiple food and drink types
  • Funny cutscenes
  • Purchase upgrades to increase tips

data.short_description: Brunch Rush is a Gameboy inspired RPG where you play as Claire, a young waitress at Lily's Diner, as she tries to make some money over the summer. Things don't go as planned.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual core processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mavericks 10.9 or later
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mavericks 10.9 or later
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
